It's a really cute dress. Not too short and I'm quite tall. I really wish it had a tie on the back, because the waist is slightly too big for me (my measurement - 24" waist). But it's not bad at all. Good enough quality, goes with most everything.

评论概述: Way nicer than I had expected
评论详情: I bought this for my 16yo who is into the early 90s goth grunge look for a Christmas gift. She loved it. I had ordered stuff from all over a lot of things from high end stores and brands. When I opened this I honestly could not remember where I bought it from and the package didn’t say Amazon . So it took me a while to figure out and When I saw it came from Amazon I was extremely shocked! It is lined nicely, a really nice thick quality fabric, the ribbons that tie at the shoulders are stitched in well and are good quality, and it lays so nicely on! This can easily be dressed up for a nice event, down with a Jean jacket and sneakers for outside spring brunch or shopping or even further down with a ripped oversized cardigan  and Dr. Martens boots to go to the mall or a regular school dance… definitely the little black dress everyone age 15- 45+ could enjoy!
I bought the largest size available and it was still incredibly too small. I’m a midsize gal, at about 150, but it was still way too small.

The moment I got I was really excited and I ordered a large because Im in the middle and it usually fits me. But when I got it and I tried to put it on It would not go up my thighs and so I tried it the other way it just felt too tight. I do not recommend this if you have the same body as me!!!!
Go a size up if you don’t want it too snug, but other wise it fit perfectly I am normally a medium/small and I got a large
